pkgmetadata.longdescription: Package for Analysis of Space-Time Ecological Series // Regularization, decomposition and analysis of space-time series. The pastecs R package is a PNEC-Art4 and IFREMER (Benoit Beliaeff Benoit.Beliaeff@ifremer.fr) initiative to bring PASSTEC 2000 (http://www.obs- vlfr.fr/~enseigne/anado/passtec/passtec.htm) functionalities to R.
